SQL.LOAD: SELECT user_id, sp_claim_type_id, sp_claim_value, effective_date, expiration_date, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, sp_user_claims_id FROM elp_sp_user_claims WHERE sp_user_claims_id = :sp_user_claims_id
SQL.LOAD_SP_USER_CLAIMS: SELECT uc.sp_user_claims_id, uc.sp_claim_type_id, uc.sp_claim_value, uc.effective_date, uc.expiration_date FROM elp_sp_user_claims uc WHERE uc.user_id = :user_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_sp_user_claims SET user_id = :user_id, sp_claim_type_id = :sp_claim_type_id, sp_claim_value = :sp_claim_value, effective_date = :effective_date, expiration_date = :expiration_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE sp_user_claims_id = :sp_user_claims_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_sp_user_claims ( user_id, sp_claim_type_id, sp_claim_value, effective_date, expiration_date, created_by, sp_user_claims_id ) VALUES ( :user_id, :sp_claim_type_id, :sp_claim_value, :effective_date, :expiration_date, :created_by, :sp_user_claims_id )
